alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Henry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 11:20AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Henry and south central Franklin Counties and the City of Martinsville through 1145 AM EST... At 1119 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fieldale, or near Martinsville, and another storm 3 mile south of Horse Pasture moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martinsville... Bassett... Sydnorsville... Spencer... Ridgeway... Villa Heights... and Collinsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with these storms. If the storm intensifies and rotation strengthens, a warning may need to be issued. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for north central North Carolina...and south central Virginia.
